snippet: Goldman Sachs Execution & Clearing agreed to pay a $5.5 million penalty and give up $1.5 million in fees and commissions to settle charge with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.
abstract: Goldman Sachs Execution & Clearing agreed to pay a $5.5 million penalty and give up $1.5 million in fees and commissions to settle charge with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Unit Is Fined by Regulator
